_sText:
---THIS RELEASE IS FIXED FOR UPDATE WORKS NOW---

My third version of piratewars I made. Use cannons to sink the other teams boat, or to kill them by hitting them with cannonballs which do 50 damage, or knife them to death. The screenshot shows the maps changelist which includes: New Visual effects-high resolution textures i made- 3d skybox- Lighting for the map, cannonballs deal 50 player damage, small broken boat with grenades in center, Smaller boats take 2 hits to kill and drive faster, new cannon sounds, Boarding plank from boat to boat. Tell me what you think.

Set for up to 40 spawns
Please stop by Tomgreen's|Mini Game|Fast DL|Great Job server 76.73.27.235:27015
and my steam id would be Tomgreen STEAM_0:0:7598918
Please leave comments on the map so I know if you liked it in order to work on simular ideas ect..
